about_the_game:
Project Shanto Rancher

Capture, Train, and Explore with your Creatures!

Welcome to the world of Project Shanto Rancher, you have been entrusted with your very own Ranch, Now it's up to you to shape it to your heart's content!

Choose Your Ranch

Begin your journey by selecting from 1 of the 6 regions of Shanto. Each region with it's own visual appeal, challenges, and unique opportunities.

Over 100+ Unique Creature Species

Explore the world of Shanto and discover a variety of Creature species each with their own set of moves, and multiple colorways.

Visit Thicc City

Thicc City is Shanto's Mega-City, this is where you will find the Shopping Center, School, Shantosseum, Lab, and more!

Capture Creatures Your Way

Multiple ways to Capture your Creature, Head-to-Head Encounters, Stake-outs, and Fishing!

Unlock the Secrets of Shanto

Discover Hidden Locations, Markets, Characters, Creatures, and Endings!

name: Project Shanto Rancher

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 420 MB available space

short_description: Project Shanto Rancher is a Creature Collecting game, in which you create your own ranch, and fill it with the creatures you capture along the way. Explore 6 different regions and unlock the mysteries of the world of Shanto.
